name: ext_R4_FamilyMemberHistory_instantiatesCanonical
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.FamilyMemberHistory.instantiatesCanonical for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents FamilyMemberHistory.instantiatesCanonical from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this FamilyMemberHistory.
element.comment: `FamilyMemberHistory.instantiatesCanonical` maps to R3 `FamilyMemberHistory.definition`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url
